In a conference call with financial analysts after the surprise announcement that Page would replace Eric Schmidt in April, co-founder Sergey Brin indicated the company would be putting more effort into the social arena. We've touched just one percent of the capabilities that could be deployed in that realm, said Sergey Brin , who will be in charge of strategic projects and new products in the new management structure.
